Title: Bandits kill community guard, two hunters in Zamfara
Summary: Armed bandits have killed a member of the Community Protection Guard (CPG) and two local hunters during an attack in Kungurki village, Kaura Namoda Local Government Area of Zamfara State . Security analyst and counter insurgency expert, Zagazola Makama, in a statement .

Title: Group plans 15m jobs in Nigeria
Summary: Group plans to create 15.8 million jobs across all sectors of national life . Director-General of Nigeria First Agenda, Henry Nwabueze, said this in a statement .

Title: Starovoit: Minister sacked by Putin commits suicide hours after dismissal
Summary: Roman Starovoit was found dead with a gunshot wound inside a car . The 52-year-old politician was sacked by Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday . The former transport minister had been found dead in a car in Moscow .

Title: TSC scandal: Nasarawa Assembly assures teachers of recovery of their money
Summary: Nasarawa State House of Assembly assured the affected teachers of recovery their money from the former Chairman, Teachers Service Commission (TSC), Mohammed Gada and others involved in the alleged employment scandal .

Title: No going back on nuclear test ban, Shettima tells CTBTO
Summary: Vice President Kashim Shettima has reaffirmed Nigeria’s commitment to a comprehensive global ban on nuclear testing . He declared that Africa's urgent priorities lie in fighting poverty and mitigating the impacts of climate change, not in the pursuit of nuclear armament .

Title: Police order clampdown, as rival cult groups plan initiation, supremacy battle in Anambra
Summary: Police order clampdown, as rival cult groups plan initiation, supremacy battle in Anambra . The Anambran State Commissioner of Police has ordered a clampdown on any unlawful gathering in the state .

Title: Barcelona’s Szczesny renews contract until 2027
Summary: Barcelona goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny has renewed his contract until 2027 . The La Liga champions said on Monday that the goalkeeper will remain at the Nou Camp .

Title: Abiodun makes fresh appointments: 12 aides, 27 LG liaison officers named
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Prince Dapo Abiodun, has approved the appointment of 12 new aides and 27 liaison officers . The appointments are part of efforts to strengthen governance and deepen grassroots engagement across the state .

Title: CBEX: EFCC arraigns 2 for alleged investment fraud
Summary: The suspects were alleged to have collected public funds and promised up to 88 per cent returns on investment without regulatory approval . EFCC arraigns 2 for alleged investment fraud .

Title: 2027: Nasarawa North APC stakeholders endorse Tinubu, Gov Sule for senate
Summary: All Progressives Congress stakeholders in Nasarawa North Senatorial District endorse Tinubu for second term . They called on Governor Abdullahi Sule to contest for the Senate seat representing the district .
